summary: Client requested that Sarah start a vision meeting. The PM asked what to call the project; other attendees gave no comments.

actions.task: Start and schedule a vision meeting to define the project vision and decide the project name

backlog_deltas.title: Add backlog item to define project name and capture vision/outcomes from the vision meeting

risks.risk: Project name and vision are undefined, risking unclear scope and misaligned work.
risks.mitigation: Hold the vision meeting promptly, document agreed name and scope, and circulate notes to stakeholders for confirmation.
